trans-unit.source: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Release notes for Azure Search describing the latest updates to the service
trans-unit.target: Release notes for Azure Search describing the latest updates to the service

trans-unit.source: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search
trans-unit.target: What’s new in the latest update to Azure Search

trans-unit.source: Azure Search is now generally available, offering a 99.9% availability service-level agreement (SLA) for supported configurations of the <link><linkText>2015-02-28 version of the API</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Azure Search is now generally available, offering a 99.9% availability service-level agreement (SLA) for supported configurations of the <link><linkText>2015-02-28 version of the API</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: How features are versioned and rolled out
trans-unit.target: How features are versioned and rolled out

trans-unit.source: Features are released separately or jointly through the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link>, or the service dashboard in the <link><linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Features are released separately or jointly through the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link>, or the service dashboard in the <link><linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Both the .NET library and REST APIs have multiple versions.
trans-unit.target: Both the .NET library and REST APIs have multiple versions.

trans-unit.source: Older APIs remain operational as we roll out new features.
trans-unit.target: Older APIs remain operational as we roll out new features.

trans-unit.source: You can visit <link><linkText>Search service versioning</linkText><title></title></link> to learn more about our versioning policy.
trans-unit.target: You can visit <link><linkText>Search service versioning</linkText><title></title></link> to learn more about our versioning policy.

trans-unit.source: .NET SDK 0.10.0-preview
trans-unit.target: .NET SDK 0.10.0-preview

trans-unit.source: This is the second iteration of the .NET client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll.
trans-unit.target: This is the second iteration of the .NET client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll.

trans-unit.source: This version adds support for creating, managing, and using Indexers via .NET classes.
trans-unit.target: This version adds support for creating, managing, and using Indexers via .NET classes.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, for Azure SQL Indexers, there is new support for indexing geography points.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, for Azure SQL Indexers, there is new support for indexing geography points.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Indexers Class</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Indexers Class</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>DataSource Class</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>DataSource Class</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: .NET SDK 0.9.6-preview
trans-unit.target: .NET SDK 0.9.6-preview

trans-unit.source: Released: 2015 March 5
trans-unit.target: Released: 2015 March 5

trans-unit.source: This is the first public release of the .NET SDK for Azure Search.
trans-unit.target: This is the first public release of the .NET SDK for Azure Search.

trans-unit.source: It includes a client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll, with two namespaces:
trans-unit.target: It includes a client library, Microsoft.Azure.Search.dll, with two namespaces:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft.Azure.Search</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft.Azure.Search</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Excludes:
trans-unit.target: Excludes:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Indexers</linkText><title></title></link> (this feature is no longer excluded in the 0.10.0-preview version)
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Indexers</linkText><title></title></link> (this feature is no longer excluded in the 0.10.0-preview version)

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Management REST API</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Management REST API</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: 2015-02-28-Preview features (currently, preview-only features consist of Microsoft natural language processors and moreLikeThis).
trans-unit.target: 2015-02-28-Preview features (currently, preview-only features consist of Microsoft natural language processors and moreLikeThis).

trans-unit.source: Visit <link><linkText>How to use Azure Search in .NET</linkText><title></title></link> for guidance on installation and usage of the SDK.
trans-unit.target: Visit <link><linkText>How to use Azure Search in .NET</linkText><title></title></link> for guidance on installation and usage of the SDK.

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2015-02-28-Preview
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2015-02-28-Preview

trans-unit.source: Released: 2015 April 22
trans-unit.target: Released: 2015 April 22

trans-unit.source: Indexers now support fieldMapping constructs that provide field assignments when actual field names are different between the external database and the Azure Search index.
trans-unit.target: Indexers now support fieldMapping constructs that provide field assignments when actual field names are different between the external database and the Azure Search index.

trans-unit.source: See Indexers for the 2015-02-28-preview version of the indexers documentation..
trans-unit.target: See Indexers for the 2015-02-28-preview version of the indexers documentation..

trans-unit.source: Also in this preview update, indexers now support field type transformations so that you can map a string field in a SQL table to a string collection field in a search index, assuming the source field represents a JSON array.
trans-unit.target: Also in this preview update, indexers now support field type transformations so that you can map a string field in a SQL table to a string collection field in a search index, assuming the source field represents a JSON array.

trans-unit.source: Released: 2015 March 5
trans-unit.target: Released: 2015 March 5

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Microsoft natural language processors</linkText><title></title></link> bring support for more languages and expansive stemming for all the languages supported by Office and Bing.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Microsoft natural language processors</linkText><title></title></link> bring support for more languages and expansive stemming for all the languages supported by Office and Bing.

trans-unit.source: moreLikeThis= is a search parameter, mutually exclusive of search=, that triggers an alternate query execution path.
trans-unit.target: moreLikeThis= is a search parameter, mutually exclusive of search=, that triggers an alternate query execution path.

trans-unit.source: Instead of full-text search of search= based on a search term input, moreLikeThis= finds documents that are similar to a given document by comparing their searchable fields.
trans-unit.target: Instead of full-text search of search= based on a search term input, moreLikeThis= finds documents that are similar to a given document by comparing their searchable fields.

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2015-02-28
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2015-02-28

trans-unit.source: Released: 2015 March 5
trans-unit.target: Released: 2015 March 5

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Indexers</linkText><title></title></link> is a new feature that vastly simplifies indexing from data sources on Azure SQL Database, Azure DocumentDB, and SQL Server on Azure VMs.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Indexers</linkText><title></title></link> is a new feature that vastly simplifies indexing from data sources on Azure SQL Database, Azure DocumentDB, and SQL Server on Azure VMs.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Suggesters</linkText><title></title></link> replaces the more limited, type-ahead query support of the previous implementation (it only matched on prefixes) by adding support for infix matching.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Suggesters</linkText><title></title></link> replaces the more limited, type-ahead query support of the previous implementation (it only matched on prefixes) by adding support for infix matching.

trans-unit.source: This implementation can find matches anywhere in a term, and also supports fuzzy matching.
trans-unit.target: This implementation can find matches anywhere in a term, and also supports fuzzy matching.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Tag boosting</linkText><title></title></link> enables a new scenario for scoring profiles.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Tag boosting</linkText><title></title></link> enables a new scenario for scoring profiles.

trans-unit.source: In particular, it leverages persisted data (such as shopping preferences) so that you can boost search results for individual users, based on personalized information.
trans-unit.target: In particular, it leverages persisted data (such as shopping preferences) so that you can boost search results for individual users, based on personalized information.

trans-unit.source: Visit <link><linkText>Azure Search is now Generally Available</linkText><title></title></link> for the service announcement on the Azure blog that discusses all of these features.
trans-unit.target: Visit <link><linkText>Azure Search is now Generally Available</linkText><title></title></link> for the service announcement on the Azure blog that discusses all of these features.

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2014-10-20-Preview
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2014-10-20-Preview

trans-unit.source: Released: 2014 November, 2015 January
trans-unit.target: Released: 2014 November, 2015 January

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Lucene language analyzers</linkText><title></title></link> was added to provide multi-lingual support for the custom language analyzers distributed with Lucene.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Lucene language analyzers</linkText><title></title></link> was added to provide multi-lingual support for the custom language analyzers distributed with Lucene.

trans-unit.source: Tool support was introduced for building indexes, including scoring profiles, in the <link><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Tool support was introduced for building indexes, including scoring profiles, in the <link><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Api-version 2014-07-31-Preview
trans-unit.target: Api-version 2014-07-31-Preview

trans-unit.source: Released: 2014 August 21
trans-unit.target: Released: 2014 August 21

trans-unit.source: This version was the public preview release for Azure Search, providing the following core features:
trans-unit.target: This version was the public preview release for Azure Search, providing the following core features:

trans-unit.source: REST API for index and document operations.
trans-unit.target: REST API for index and document operations.

trans-unit.source: The majority of this API version is intact in 2015-02-28.
trans-unit.target: The majority of this API version is intact in 2015-02-28.

trans-unit.source: The documentation for version 2014-07-31-Preview can be found at Azure Search Service REST API Version 2014-07-31.
trans-unit.target: The documentation for version 2014-07-31-Preview can be found at Azure Search Service REST API Version 2014-07-31.

trans-unit.source: Scoring profiles for tuning search results.
trans-unit.target: Scoring profiles for tuning search results.

trans-unit.source: A scoring profile adds criteria used to compute search scores.
trans-unit.target: A scoring profile adds criteria used to compute search scores.

trans-unit.source: The documentation for this feature can be found at <link><linkText>Azure Search Service Scoring Profiles REST API Version 2014-07-31</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The documentation for this feature can be found at <link><linkText>Azure Search Service Scoring Profiles REST API Version 2014-07-31</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Geospatial support has been available from the beginning, provided through the Edm.GeographyPoint data type that has been part of Azure Search since its inception.
trans-unit.target: Geospatial support has been available from the beginning, provided through the Edm.GeographyPoint data type that has been part of Azure Search since its inception.

trans-unit.source: Provisioning in the preview version of the <link><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Provisioning in the preview version of the <link><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Azure Search was one of the few services that has only been available in the new portal.
trans-unit.target: Azure Search was one of the few services that has only been available in the new portal.

trans-unit.source: Management api-version 2015-02-28
trans-unit.target: Management api-version 2015-02-28

trans-unit.source: Released: 2015 March 5
trans-unit.target: Released: 2015 March 5

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Management REST API</linkText><title></title></link> marks the first version of the management API belonging to the generally available release of Azure Search.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Management REST API</linkText><title></title></link> marks the first version of the management API belonging to the generally available release of Azure Search.

trans-unit.source: There are no feature differences between the earlier preview and this one.
trans-unit.target: There are no feature differences between the earlier preview and this one.

trans-unit.source: Management api-version 2014-07-31-Preview
trans-unit.target: Management api-version 2014-07-31-Preview

trans-unit.source: Released: 2014 October
trans-unit.target: Released: 2014 October

trans-unit.source: The preview release of <link><linkText>Management REST API</linkText><title></title></link> was added to support service administration programmatically.
trans-unit.target: The preview release of <link><linkText>Management REST API</linkText><title></title></link> was added to support service administration programmatically.

trans-unit.source: It is versioned independently of the service REST API.
trans-unit.target: It is versioned independently of the service REST API.
